LogInitialModeQueued: Initial mode queued: '{0}' (will apply when 1 valid player is present).
LogInitialModeScheduled: Initial mode scheduled (first player present): key='{0}', delay={1}s.
CmdDescReload: Reload JSON from disk and rebuild commands
HelpLineDynamicMode: !<key>             -> vote for a mode (dynamic command from config)
HelpLineReload: !mm_reload         -> reload JSON from disk + rebuild commands
VotePendingAlready: [INFO] A switch to '{0}' is already pending. Please wait.
VoteCooldown: [INFO] Please wait {0}s before starting or voting for another mode switch.
VoteIneligible: [INFO] Bots/HLTV are not eligible to vote.
VoteIdentityMissing: [ERROR] Could not identify your SteamID/UserId to vote.
VoteAnotherModeInProgress: [INFO] A vote for mode '{0}' is already in progress. Please finish it first.
VoteMinPlayers: [INFO] Minimum players required to vote: {0}. Current: {1}.
VoteStartedChat: Vote started to switch to '{0}'. Votes: 1/{1}. Type !{2} to vote.
VoteAlreadyCast: [INFO] You already voted for this switch.
VoteRegisteredChat: Vote registered for '{0}'. Votes: {1}/{2}. Expires in {3}s.
ChatSwitcherNotInitialized: Failed to apply mode (switcher not initialized).
ChatModeApplyFailed: Failed to apply mode '{0}'. Check server console.
ReloadNoPermission: [ERROR] You do not have permission to run !mm_reload.
ReloadConfigNotFound: [INFO] JSON config file was not found on disk ({0}). Rebuilding commands with in-memory config only.
ReloadUseHelp: [INFO] Use !mm to view commands and modes.
LoaderConfigNotFound: Config file not found. Tried paths: {0}
ValidationLanguageUnsupported: Language '{0}' is not supported. Supported values: {1}.
ValidationModesRequired: Config must define at least one mode in 'Modes'.
ValidationDynamicCommandConflictsBase: Modes['{0}'] generates command '{1}', which conflicts with a reserved base command.
ValidationDynamicCommandCollision: Modes['{0}'] and Modes['{1}'] generate the same dynamic command '{2}'.
ChatInitialModeScheduled: Initial mode '{0}' will be applied in {1}s.
